content: Gmail creates the app password, not you. I suggest you go to settings>privacy&security and highligh the rows for the account an delete them and then click to retrieve messages. Also, be sure that you have thunderbird set to accept cookies. When gmail prompts for password, enter your password and gmail with verify and then place an app password in thunderbird. that app password works only from that one pc.
creator: davidsk

content:
Dit kan verschillende oorzaken hebben. de meest voorkomende is dat u uw wachtwoord te vaak achter elkaar fout hebt ingetypt (fout is opgeslagen in Thunderbird). zoals het meld is dit een tijdelijke blokkade en kunt u het later weer een keer proberen

Kunt u nog wel inloggen via de webmail van Ziggo?

content:
Hi,

if your iCloud address is set up as an IMAP account maybe you have to "subscribe" the missing folders? R-click on the iCloud folder in the folder pane > Subscribe ....
creator: Mapenzi

content:
I am not the one to guide you through this, as I know little of PST files and the like. But, on contacts, this addon may simplify the process: 

https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/outlook-address-book-enabler/   Although exporting and importing csv can work, but it's tricky getting the csv's in sync. IMAP is not a problem. Converting POP files to mbox is the major challenge.
creator: davidsk
